snippet: Wilbur L. Ross Jr. provided some indication of the future of his firm, W. L. Ross, in a letter to investors, but, like many aging business titans, the line of succession has been a looming question.
abstract: Wilbur L Ross Jr provides some indication of the future of his firm, W L Ross, in a letter to investors, but, like many aging business titans, the line of succession has been a looming question; his private equity firm controls $8 billion in assets, and has struggled to raise a new fund over the past year.
lead_paragraph: Wilbur L. Ross Jr. provided some indication of the future of his firm, W. L. Ross, in a letter to investors, but, like many aging business titans, the line of succession has been a looming question.

headline.seo: Wilbur Ross, With Succession Question, Faces Challenge in Raising New Fund
headline.main: Turnaround King Tries to Convince Investors He Hasn’t Lost a Step
headline.print_headline: Turnaround King Tries to Convince Investors He Hasn’t Lost a Step
